db:abstract.db:para: Exposes C++ functionality to Qt Quick.

db:article.db:para: Exposes C++ functionality to Qt Quick.

db:listitem.db:para: Helper functions for the Qt WebEngine (Qt Quick) module.
The QQuickWebEngineProfile class provides a web engine profile shared by multiple pages.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Qt WebEngine Quick module exposes C++ functionality to Qt Quick.
To link against the module, add the following to your qmake project file:
For build with CMake use the find_package() command to locate the needed module components in the Qt6 package and target_link_libraries() to link against the module:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS WebEngineQuick) target_link_libraries(target PRIVATE Qt6::WebEngineQuick)
